full_address: 5 Donna View Rise, Yarra Junction, Vic 3797
listing_company_name: Property Partners in Real Estate - SEVILLE
description:
Just when you thought you couldn't have it all, you find a home with magical views like these, this close to town, and ready for you to simply move in and enjoy. Stylish from top to toe, this contemporary modern home has a breathtaking Hampton's vibe that has been designed without compromise. Poised to embrace easy living in a premium location only a hop, skip and a jump from Yarra Junction's thriving heart, this property delivers on exceptional practicality.

Completing the package are:
• Sleek, contemporary engineered timber floors that offer a stylish introduction, accentuating the open plan design and lead into the living and dining room that is blessed with natural light and mountain aspects.
• A gorgeous Hampton's inspired kitchen is the domain to entertain from, wonderfully adorned with ample storage, sparkling stone benchtops, quality S/S appliances, Butler's sink and on trend pendant lighting dropping warmth over the island.
• Three bedrooms all generously sized, two featuring BIR's and quality carpet underfoot, plus an impressive master bedroom with incredible views, split system, WIR and luxurious ensuite.
• The family bathroom is centrally located with an eye-catching stone topped vanity, double length shower, plantation blinds and sumptuous deep-soaking bath for ultimate relaxation.
• Further attributes that include a double lock up garage, LED downlights, reverse cycle split system, GDH, and a separate laundry for added convenience.

Perfecting modern living, this residence encourages a livelihood low in maintenance and finishing the landscaping will be a rewarding way to create the environment perfect for you. In a prime Yarra Junction cul-de-sac, positioned to take in panoramic mountain views, you are within walking distance to frequent bus services, Gladysdale Bakehouse, walking/cycling trails, recreation at the Yarra Centre and Secondary Schools. Opportunities like this are few and far between, call Property Partners today to secure your own piece of paradise.

Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office.
